meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny!

Welcome to my review of PixelJunk Monsters: Encore! I'm your groovy reviewer, here to dish out the lowdown on this tower defense extravaganza.

First off, let's get one thing straight – these critics are a bunch of party poopers! They're always going on about scores and whatnot. I mean, who needs numbers when you can have pure, unadulterated fun?!

Now, onto the review!

PixelJunk Monsters: Encore is like that friend who just won't leave your party (in a good way!). It's more of the same addictive gameplay we all know and love, with new levels to conquer and challenges to overcome. And let me tell you, these new levels are NOT for the faint of heart! They're like puzzle boxes just waiting to be solved... or destroyed.

I mean, who doesn't love a good challenge? It's like TotalPlayStation said, "The game still retains a brilliant sense of balance and an intrinsic 'just one more try' feeling..." Yeah, no kidding! I found myself stuck in this never-ending loop of "Just one more level!" And before I knew it, hours had passed and my snacks were gone.

But what about the naysayers? You know, the ones who say things like "This expansion is a luxury, not a necessity." Oh, come on! If you loved PixelJunk Monsters in the first place (and let's be real, who didn't?!), then this encore performance is the perfect way to keep that party going!

Now, I'm not gonna lie – some of these critics were a bit harsh. Like IGN saying it's "more of the same content." Um, isn't that what we all wanted in the first place?!

In conclusion, PixelJunk Monsters: Encore is like that one friend who always brings the party to your doorstep. It's a fun, challenging, and addictive experience that'll keep you hooked for hours on end. So grab some snacks, gather your squad, and get ready to defend those monsters!

That's it from me! Until next time, when I'll be reviewing something else with equal parts humor and honesty... or not, we'll see.
